description: This is the raw escapement data (actual counts of spawners, brood, etc.) that is used for the infilling

This is the xlsx sheet that does the run reconstruction of wild recruits, based on proportion wild (based on escapement), catch by CU and area, and infilled wild and total spawners. The table at the bottom "Total Stock Wild" is the total wild returns for each return year, which is used to estimate recruitment in the "prepare_data.R" file using age composition of the harvest.
how was it made?: Pieter Van Will, using infilled wild and total escapement (Luke Warkentin infilling code, "infilling_for_reconstruction.R", fishery catch data, and proportion wild from infilled data).
what is it used for?: Gives estimated wild returns to use to estimate recruitment

description: age composition data, from the fishery
what is it used for?: Making a brood table based on wild returns and spawners

description: contains obsolete infilled spawners from data up to 2013, for comparison with infilled data up to 2018 (QA/QC)
how was it made?: Luke Warkentin did infilling, Pieter Van Will assembled into multi-tab xlsx file
what is it used for?: Checking differences between 2013 and 2018 infilling data
